洦字的基本解释

洦
pò
（水）浅。

洦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pò］
［《廣韻》普伯切，入陌，滂。］
［《廣韻》莫白切，入陌，明。］
亦作“湐1”。
(1)“泊”的古字。浅水貌。
(2)见“洦洦”。

洦字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　洦； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页621第16
【廣篇】【集韻】?莫白切，音陌。【說文】淺水也。【集韻】或从陌作?。　又【廣韻】普伯切【集韻】匹陌切，?音拍。義同。　又【顏之推·家訓勉學篇】古魄字。註見鬼部五畫。　又【集韻】博陌切，音百。義同。或从柏作湐。

洦字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
洦字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Luo
pò
(Water) shallow.
Luo
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pò］
["Guangyun" Puber cut, enters the street, and peng. ]
["Guangyun" Mo Baiqie, enter the Mo, Ming. ]
Also known as "湐1".
(1) The ancient word for "Po". Shallow water appearance.
(2) See "Liao Lu".

[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　洦; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 621 16
[Guang Pian] [Ji Yun]? Mo Baiqie, Yinmo. [Said the text] Shallow water. [Ji Yun] Or from Mo Zuo?.　[Guang Yun] Pope Cut [Ji Yun] Pi Mo cut, sound beat. The same meaning.　[Yan Zhitui·Family Instruction and Encouragement Chapter] Ancient Poetry Characters. Note the five pictures of the ghost department.　[Jiyun] Bo Moqie, Yinbai. The same meaning.
